description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr8394 [Level 5]`s Layton`s Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires` Conspiracy game.
The story is set in London and follows http://anidb.net/ch93057 [Katrielle] as she solves mysteries with her talking dog Sherl.

REGULAR.description:
Katrielle Layton, an intrepid investigator who heads up the three-strong team at the Layton Detective Agency alongside her assistants Ernest and Sherl, takes on a case involving a mysterious house in which a new tenant`s family suddenly and inexplicably disappeared.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Katrielle and the Mysterious House
Katrielle to Fushigi na Ie
カトリーエイルと不思議な家

REGULAR.description:
Katrielle is approached by Pastel, a struggling musician, who claims that a strange dress he bought for his wife Olivia is causing her to become possessed.
Source: Wikipedia
